items.title: City Announces Plan to Diversify Lower Manhattan Schools
items.abstract: Parents and advocates in District 1 had pushed the city for a way to achieve racial and socioeconomic balance. Now the Education Department is giving it a go.

items.title: Protesters Urged Defunding the Police. Schools in Big Cities Are Doing It.
items.abstract: Los Angeles will eliminate a third of its school police officers, joining cities like Seattle, Denver and Minneapolis that took action after Black Lives Matter protests.

items.title: New Design for Vancouver Art Gallery Unveiled
items.abstract: The Vancouver Art Gallery is releasing first look at the design for its new building.

items.title: News Q’s | After Katrina, A City Revived but Unequal
items.abstract: What are some ways that New Orleans has changed in the 10 years since Hurricane Katrina hit?

items.title: The Gambler’s Ruin of Small Cities (Wonkish)
items.abstract: Small industrial cities are accidents of history, and sometimes their luck runs out.
